/usr/lib64/openmpi/bin/mpic++    -std=c99 -g -O0    CMakeFiles/darray_no_async.dir/darray_no_async.c.o  -o darray_no_async -rdynamic ../../src/clib/libpioc.a ../../src/gptl/libgptl.a ../../tools/adios2pio-nm/libadios2pio-nm-lib.a /home/tkurc/codar/acme/pnetcdf/lib/libpnetcdf.a /home/tkurc/codar/adios-install/lib/libadios.a -lpthread -lm
